info.title: ArchSmart API Documentation
info.description:
Complete API documentation for ArchSmart Real Estate Platform. 
 * 
 * **Authentication:**
 * 1. First, login using the `/login` endpoint with your credentials
 * 2. Copy the token from the response
 * 3. Click the 'Authorize' button (ðŸ”“) at the top right
 * 4. Paste your token in the value field (just the token, without 'Bearer')
 * 5. Click 'Authorize' and then 'Close'
 * 6. Now you can test all protected endpoints
 * 
 * **Note:** All API requests should use `Accept: application/json` header.

get.description: Retrieve list of all agents with their status and approval information
Retrieve list of agents awaiting approval

post.description: Approve a pending agent registration
Suspend or deactivate an agent account
Create a new user account with specified role (admin, agent, or user)
Authenticate user and get access token
Revoke current access token

get.description: Retrieve currently authenticated user details
Retrieve all blog posts including drafts and published. Admin only.
Retrieve all published blog posts with author information

post.description: Create a new blog post. Authenticated users can create posts.

get.description: Retrieve a single blog post by its slug or ID. Supports fuzzy matching for slugs.

put.description: Update an existing blog post. Authors can update their own posts, admins can update any post.

delete.description: Delete a blog post. Authors can delete their own posts, admins can delete any post.

get.description: Retrieve all comments for a specific blog post

post.description: Add a comment to a blog post. Authenticated users auto-fill name/email.

get.description: Retrieve list of consultation requests with optional limit

post.description: Submit a consultation request. Public endpoint.

message.example: I would like to schedule a consultation...

put.description: Update consultation status and add response message

response_message.example: Thank you for your consultation request...

get.description: Retrieve dashboard metrics. Admins see system-wide statistics, agents see their own property data.

post.description: Create or update a blog post draft for autosave functionality

get.description: Retrieve a saved blog post draft
Retrieve paginated list of inquiries with optional filters. Authenticated users only.

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search in name, email, subject, or message

post.description: Submit a general or property-specific inquiry. Public endpoint.

message.example: Inquiry submitted successfully. We will get back to you soon.

get.description: Retrieve details of a single inquiry

put.description: Update inquiry status and add response message

get.description: Retrieve statistics about inquiries including counts by status and type
Retrieve list of notifications for authenticated user, sorted by unread first
Retrieve count of unread notifications for authenticated user

post.description: Mark a single notification as read
Mark all unread notifications as read for authenticated user

get.description: Retrieve list of all approved properties with agent information

post.description: Create a new property listing. Agents create pending properties, admins create approved properties.

get.description: Retrieve up to 6 featured approved properties
Retrieve details of a single approved property with agent information
Authenticated users can view approved properties or their own pending properties. Admins can view all properties.
Get all properties for the authenticated user. Admins see all properties, agents see only their own.

put.description: Update an existing property. Agents can update their own properties, admins can update any property.

delete.description: Delete a property. Agents can delete their own properties, admins can delete any property.

post.description: Approve a pending property listing. Sends notification to the agent.
Reject a pending property listing

get.description: Retrieve all properties awaiting approval
Retrieve all approved properties with agent information
Retrieve all approved properties listed by a specific agent
Retrieve the VAPID public key for push notification subscriptions

post.description: Register a push notification subscription for authenticated user
Send a test push notification to verify subscription
Send a push notification to all subscribed users

get.description: Check if the API is running and responding

message.example: ArchSmart Backend and API is running

get.description: Retrieve unique tags from all blog posts, with optional search filter

post.description: Send password reset email to registered email address
Reset user password using token from email

get.description: Serve media files from allowed folders (profile_pictures, properties, blogs, services, images)

bio.example: Experienced real estate agent with 10+ years

description.example: Beautiful 5 bedroom villa with pool and garden

agent_id.description: ID of the agent who listed the property

content.description: HTML content of the blog post

excerpt.example: Learn essential tips for buying your first home...

message.example: I'm interested in property #123 and would like more information
I need consultation for smart home integration

sanctum.description: Enter your Bearer token (the token will be automatically prefixed with 'Bearer ')
